page.title: 20TWO CONTRASTING SCHOOLS 3
page.content: After the bell had rung for break I got a netball out of the cupboard because I've got to get my shooting ready for the netball tournament on Saturday. Lisa Gray shot with me. (10.45) When I came in from break there were some visitors coming to look around our classroom. I worked on my Bayeux tapestry and then I wrote this diary (There has been a village school in {Eye}for 130 years but it got too small. The Victorian infant and junior schools still exist, they are near the {church of St Matthew ,EYE}). {Work completed by the children of: {Eye Church of England Primary, {Walton County Primary and {Dogsthorpe County Junior.
